CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(MONTH(Start_Date__c)) = TEXT(01) , Contact__r.MailingCity + '' + Contact__r.MailingState + ''+ TEXT(MONTH(Start_Date__c)+11) +''+ TEXT(YEAR(Start_Date__c)), Contact__r.MailingCity + '' + Contact__r.MailingState + ''+ TEXT(MONTH(Start_Date__c)-1) +''+ TEXT(YEAR(Start_Date__c)))
CustomField.label: Month State City
